title: Will there be any Gemstones-skin for supporters?
body: When I look at the Hextech-exclusive skins i see no champ which could be usefully played as support. What are the criteria to decide which champ gets a Gemstone-skin? Why is there no supportive champ :(.

replies.body: D e u t s c h e s F o r u m
Einen jungen Zilean als Hextech Belohnung. Ja, das w√§re schon cool
